name: JumpJam
description:
Hey, this is my first game for a jam (gbjam8).

It is a simple game made in about 24 hours with SDL2 and cpp, where your only objective is to climb as far as you can. (the initial gb resolution is scaled by 4 to see everything).

Controls:

Press <space> to start.
Controls are in <azerty> format.
press <R> to restart a game when you lose.

ENJOY ! (and feel free to ask me anything and i'm listening to advices and any reviews)
